title: Was Uncharted Worth It? - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 56
description:
Amy Hennig worked 80-hour weeks for a decade to make the Uncharted franchise, but is that kind of stress worth the end product? Greg and Colin discuss and tackle your questions. (Released 10.11.16)

Thanks to our sponsors Dollar Shave Club and Uber. Check them out at http://www.dollarshaveclub.com/love and http://www.uber.com/drivenow.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafun...

Get you PS I Love You XOXO shirts and posters: http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Listen to today's artist here: https://soundcloud.com/chris-doerksen-1/sets/wheredowegofromhereep

Submit questions for the show here: http://www.kindafunny.com/psq

Greg and Colin are back with a weekly PlayStation podcast. Catch it on YouTube and podcast services each and every Tuesday at 9 a.m. PT!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
